dmca.title: Infringement of John Wiley & Sons, Inc.'s Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: pmurphy@wiley.com [mailto:pmurphy@wiley.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 13, 2005 1:34 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com; info@theplanet.com; info@singcat.com
Subject: Fw: Infringement of John Wiley & Sons, Inc.'s Copyright


----- Forwarded by Patrick Murphy/Corp/Hoboken/Wiley on 05/13/2005 02:33 PM
-----
                                                                           
             Patrick                                                       
             Murphy/Corp/Hobo                                              
             ken/Wiley                                                  To 
                                      jazar@myrealbox.com,                 
             05/13/2005 02:32         abuse@theplanet.com,                 
             PM                       admins@theplanet.com,                
                                      legal@theplamet.com,                 
                                      info@theplanet.com info@singcat.com  
                                                                        cc 
                                                                           
                                                                   Subject 
                                      Infringement of John Wiley & Sons,   
                                      Inc.'s Copyright                     
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           



May 13, 2005

To Whom it May Concern:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher
of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies
("Wiley").

We recently learned that unauthorized copies of the material listed below
are available for sale on a website hosted by your company at the following
URL address: http://www.flazx.com.  The material is as follows:

1.    3ds Studio Max 4 Bible (ISBN 076454621X) by Kelly Murdock
2.    Active Directory Bible (ISBN 0764547623) by Curt Simmons
3.    Adobe Photoshop 6 Bible (ISBN 0764535978) by Deke McClelland
4.    Adobe Photoshop CS All-in-One Desk Reference for Dummies (ISBN
0764542397) by Barbara Obermeier
5.    Advanced CISSP Prep Guide: Exam Q&A (ISBN 0471236632) by Ronald Krutz
6.    Apache Server 2.0 Bible (ISBN 0764548212) by Mohammed Kabir
7.    Art of Intrusion (ISBN 0764569597) by Kevin Mitnick
8.    Art of Software Architecture (ISBN 0471228869) by Stephen Albin
9.    ASP.NET Bible (ISBN 0764548166) by Mridula Parihar
10.   BEA Web Logic Server Bible (ISBN 0764526022) by Joe Zuffeletto
11.   Beginning InfoPath 2003 (ISBN 0764579487) by F. Scott Barker
12.   Beginning JavaServer Pages (ISBN 076457485X) by Vivek Chopra
13.   Beginning SQL (ISBN 0764577328) by Paul Wilton
14.   Broadband Packet Switching Technologies (ISBN 0471004545) by H. Jason
Chao
15.   Building Your Business with Google for Dummies (ISBN 0764571435) by
Brad Hill
16.   Business Modeling with UML (ISBN 0471295515) by Hans-Erik Eriksson
17.   C++ Timesaving Techniques for Dummies (ISBN 076457986X) by Matthew
Telles
18.   Control and Security of E-Commerce (ISBN 0471180904) by Gordon Smith
19.   Creating Web Pages All-in-One Desk Reference for Dummies (ISBN
0764543458) by Emily Van Der Veer
20.   Digital Video for Dummies (ISBN 0764541145) by Keith Underdahl
21.   Dreamweaver 3 Bible (ISBN 0764534580) by Joseph Lowery
22.   Dreamweaver 4 Bible (ISBN 0764535692) by Joseph Lowery
23.   Dreamweaver MX Bible (ISBN 0764549316) by Joseph Lowery
24.   Dreamweaver MX Weekend Crash Course (ISBN 0764549308) by Wendy Peck
25.   Dynamic Enterprise Architecture (ISBN 0471682721) by Roel Wagter
26.   Eclipse for Dummies (ISBN 0764574701) by Barry Burd
27.   Excel Timesaving Techniques for Dummies (ISBN 0764574272) by Greg
Harvey
28.   Flash 5 Bible (ISBN 0764535153) by Robert Reinhardt
29.   Flash MX Design for TV and Video (ISBN 0764536818) by Janet Galore
30.   Fundamentals of Computer Organization and Architecture (ISBN
0471467413) by Mostafa Abd-El-Barr
31.   Fundamentals of Global Positioning System Receivers (ISBN 0471706477)
by James Bao-Yen Tsui
32.   Fuzzy Expert Systems and Fuzzy Reasoning (ISBN 0471388599) by William
Siler
33.   Getting Started in Project Management (ISBN 0471135038) by Paula
Martin
34.   Hacking for Dummies (ISBN 076455784X) by Kevin Beaver
35.   HTML, XHTML and CSS Bible (ISBN 0764557394) by Bryan Pfaffenberger
36.   HTML 4 for Dummies (ISBN 0764589172) by Ed Tittel
37.   Intelligent Image Processing (ISBN 0471406376) by Steven Mann
38.   JavaScript Bible (ISBN 0764557432) by Danny Goodman
39.   KDE 2 QT Programming Bible (ISBN 0764546821) by Arthur Griffin
40.   Linux Bible (ISBN 0764579495) by Christopher Negus
41.   Linux + Certification Bible (ISBN 0764548816) by Trevor Kay
42.   Linux for Dummies (ISBN 0764579371) by Dee-Ann LeBlanc
43.   Macromedia Studio MX 2004 All-in-One Desk Reference for Dummies (ISBN
0764517996) by Damon Dean
44.   Microsoft Office 2003 Super Bible (ISBN 0764539493) by Edward Willett
45.   Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Weekend Crash Course (ISBN 0764548409) by
Alex Krieger
46.   MySQL Bible (ISBN 0764549324) by Steve Suehring
47.   Network Security Bible (ISBN 0764573977) by Eric Cole
48.   Networking Approach to Grid Computing (ISBN 0471687561) by Daniel
Minoli
49.   Networking for Dummies (ISBN 0764516779) by Doug Lowe
50.   Paint Shop Pro 9 for Dummies (ISBN 0764579355) by David Kay
51.   PC Upgrade and Repair Bible, Desktop Edition (ISBN 0764557319) by
Barry Press
52.   Photoshop CS Bible (ISBN 0764541781) by Deke McClelland
53.   Photoshop Elements 3 for Dummies (ISBN 0764570625) by Deke McClelland
54.   PHP 5 for Dummies (ISBN 0764541668) by Janet Valade
55.   PHP and MySQL for Dummies (ISBN 0764555898) by Janet Valade
56.   Professional ADO.NET (ISBN 0764584375) by Wallace McClure
57.   Project Management Methodologies (ISBN 0471221783) by Jason Charvat
58.   Python 2.1 Bible (ISBN 0764548077) by Stephen Tanner
59.   QuickBooks 2005 Bible (ISBN 0764571079) by Jill Gilbert
60.   Red Hat Linux 7.2 Bible (ISBN 0764536303) by Christopher Negus
61.   Rexx Programmer's Reference (ISBN 0764579967) by Howard Fosdick
62.   Semantics with Applications (ISBN 0471929808) by Nielson
63.   SQL for Dummies (ISBN 0764540750) by Allen Taylor
64.   SUSE Linux 9 Bible (ISBN 0764577395) by Justin Davies
65.   TCP/IP Analysis and Troubleshooting (ISBN 0471429759) by Kevin Burns
66.   Troubleshooting Your PC for Dummies (ISBN 0764577425) by Dan Gookin
67.   UML 2 for Dummies (ISBN 0764526146) by Michael Chonoles
68.   WebEx Web Meetings for Dummies (ISBN 076457941X) by Nancy Stevenson
69.   Windows Server 2003 for Dummies (ISBN 0764516337) by Ed Tittel
70.   Windows XP Bible (ISBN 0764578154) by Alan Simpson
71.   Windows XP for Dummies (ISBN 0764573268) by Andy Rathbone
72.   Windows XP GigaBook for Dummies (ISBN 0764569228) by Peter Werverka
73.   Wireless Home Networking for Dummies (ISBN 0764539108) by Danny
Briere
74.   XML 1.1 Bible (ISBN 0764549863) by Elliotte Harold

I have a good faith belief that the use of the title(s) identified above is
(are) not authorized by Wiley, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe
Wiley's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Needless
to say, this constitutes a serious violation of our rights.

We understand that many responsible ISPs inadvertently infringe the
copyrights of others, and that this may be one such case.  Accordingly, we
will forbear legal action against your company provided that you comply with
the following:

1.    You remove or block access to the infringing matter within 48 hours
of the time and date of this e-mail; and

2.    You provide reasonably requested assistance in helping Wiley to find
and prosecute the responsible party/parties.  This includes sending me any
information you have on file regarding the owner of the offending website.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Sincerely,
Patrick Murphy
Paralegal
John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
111 River Street, Mail Stop 3-05
Hoboken, NJ  07030
Phone: 201-748-6014 / Fax: 201-748-6500
E-Mail Address: pmurphy@wiley.com

My name, typed above, constitutes an electronic signature under Federal law,
and is intended to be binding.
